data.title: Rick Moranis News
data.text:
The ‘Honey, I Shrunk The Kids’ Reboot Is Not Happening

Rick Moranis was going to come out of retirement for the film.

Movie and TV Stars Who Quit Acting Forever

The sad reasons why you stopped seeing some of your favorite stars.

Rick Moranis Attacked in New York City

There is a cash reward for information on the suspect.

Rick Moranis Emerges From Retirement For Phone Commercial

Moranis hasn’t made a movie in decades.

Rick Moranis Will Star in New ‘Honey, I Shrunk the Kids’ Sequel

Moranis hasn’t made a movie in many years.

Rick Moranis Is NOT Expected in the New ‘Ghostbusters’

Guess we won't see the return of Louis Tully.

Rick Moranis Will Return for Netflix 'SCTV' Reunion

The Rick Moranis comeback tour continues. Just days after the Spaceballs star came out of retirement to reprise his role for The Goldbergs, Netflix confirms the SCTV comic legend will return for Netflix’s upcoming reunion special directed by Martin Scorsese.

Watch Rick Moranis' 'Spaceballs' Return From 'The Goldbergs'

It’s been almost 30 years since Spaceballs hit theaters, and Rick Moranis is finally back under the (dark) helmet. Watch the beloved star come out of retirement to reprise his role as Dark Helmet in a clip from Wednesday’s Goldbergs episode.
